1.0.3.en: Add tool-versions and improve version command

1.0.5.en: Ignore errors when Volkswagen API times out

1.0.6.en: Add difference between current SoC and target/full SoC

1.0.8.en: Increase stability by adding capabilities one-by-one

1.0.10.en: Add charging settings & charging state flow actions

1.0.11.en: Add conditional checks for flow actions

1.0.13.en: Replace optional flow values for dropdowns

1.0.14.en: Improve the errors shown to the user during the login device pairing

1.1.2.en: Add translations to the coordinate sensors

1.1.4.en: Fix filtering on climatisation capability for trigger flow cards

1.1.5.en: Add battery as percentage device indicator

1.1.6.en: Add 'is plug connected' and 'is charging' capabilities

1.1.7.en: Fix missing capabilities on the Tayron

1.1.8.en: Fix undefined variable for the Arteon

1.1.10.en: Fix locking and unlocking the vehicle

1.1.11.en: Add missing guard structure for settable only capabilities

1.1.13.en: Fix updating charging settings flow with unchanged values

1.1.14.en: Always pick the closest max charging capacity when the vehicle expects a string-based parameter

1.1.18.en: Improve ranges per engine type, add support for oil percentage and add more vehicle inspection capabilities

1.1.22.en: Add action card to change polling interval setting

1.1.23.en: Update flows to make them compatible with multipe devices
